Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: xed

Arguments.Name: --launch
Arguments.Description: Launches Xcode, opening a new empty unsaved file

Arguments.Name: --create
Arguments.Description: Creates any non-existent files in the file list. If used without --launch, standard input will be read and piped to the last file created

Arguments.Name: --wait
Arguments.Description: Wait for the files to be closed before exiting. xed will idle and will only terminate when all files are closed

Arguments.Name: --line
Arguments.Description: Selects the given line in the last file opened

Arguments.Name: --background
Arguments.Description: Opens Xcode without activating it; the process that invoked xed remains in front

Arguments.Name: --version
Arguments.Description: Prints the version number of xed
